posts.post_title: For Trade:  T212 150 series LaLonge and a 1909 T212 Willis
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anthony S.

Hoping to trade the 150 series LaLaonge for a 150 I need.  Poor condition.  Please click below link for photos.

Also would like to trade the 1909 Willis for any 1909 I need.  Click link for photos.

The 1910 Brashear is $25 (edit: SOLD).  F-P condition, but "The Story in Smoking" is one of the 5 toughest backs.

my email: boboinnes33@gmail.com
